channel.title: In Grad School on The Grad School Chronicles
channel.description: Recent content in In Grad School on The Grad School Chronicles

item.title: I Graduated!
item.description:
Hey, guess what? This version of WordPress is really old, I haven’t updated this blog in forever, and I graduated!

I’ll keep this thing around because I think many people have used it as a resource. Also, who knows if I might someday try for a PhD?

Until then, have a great summer, stay cool, K.I.T. etc.

item.title: Don’t Worry, I’m Still in Grad School…
item.description:
I just hardly post on this blog anymore. But I do post on my personal blog. It just sorta makes more sense that way, since it usually has a higher readership on average.

I posted my thoughts on the current internship hunt that I’m facing. I thought it might be useful for people who have already gotten into grad school, and who are looking for a good internship for the Summer. I don’t have a complete list of internships for social computing-minded people, but I have a start…
